title: ‘A Bit of a Shock’: Mathieu van der Poel on Wout van Aert’s Unexpected Decision to Ride World Championships
content:
Path to victory suddenly more complicated, but reigning champion Van der Poel describes big rival’s change of heart as ‘a pleasant surprise’.

Read the full article at ‘A Bit of a Shock’: Mathieu van der Poel on Wout van Aert’s Unexpected Decision to Ride World Championships on Velo.
author: sstokes
